Centro de Investigación
En Ingeniería Molecular.

CIIM at Universidad Católica de Santa María drives molecular engineering research using computational methods, training researchers to advance biology.

Contact us Repo
Research Areas

Advancing Scientific Knowledge

Our research center combines computational methods, molecular analysis, and data science to push the boundaries of scientific discovery and innovation.

Molecular Dynamics

Simulate the physical movements of atoms and molecules over time to gain insights into structural stability, conformational changes, and thermodynamic properties of biomolecular systems.

Bioinformatics

Analyze and interpret biological data using computational tools and algorithms, enabling discoveries in genomics, transcriptomics, and personalized medicine.

Chem-Informatics

Utilize chemical structure data and informatics techniques to discover patterns, predict properties, and guide rational drug design and compound optimization.
